introduction: Aurora Teagarden Mysteries: Something New takes place during Aurora's (Skyler Samuels) post-college days when she finds herself back home in Lawrenceton. While her mother, Aida (Marilu Henner), struggles to keep her newfound real estate business, Aurora supports herself by working as a teacher's assistant in a crime fiction class and waitresses at the local diner at night, where she shares her love of researching true crime with her friend, Sally, and police officer, Arthur (Evan Roderick). When Sally's fiancée doesn't show up at their wedding rehearsal, maid of honor Aurora gets Arthur to help her search for him. When they discover a body, everyone assumes it is Sally's tardy groom, but when it turns out to be someone else, Sally's fiancée becomes the main suspect.—Natayla奥罗拉茶园之谜：奥罗拉（斯凯勒·塞缪尔斯饰）大学毕业后，当她回到劳伦斯顿的家时，发生了一些新的事情。当她的母亲阿伊达（玛丽露·亨纳饰）努力维持她新发现的房地产生意时，奥罗拉则靠在犯罪小说课上担任助教和晚上在当地小餐馆当女服务员来养活自己，在那里她分享了她对研究真实事物的热爱。与她的朋友莎莉和警官亚瑟（埃文·罗德里克饰）一起犯罪。当莎莉的未婚妻没有出现在婚礼彩排时，伴娘奥罗拉让亚瑟帮助她寻找他。当他们发现一具尸体时，每个人都认为这是莎莉迟到的新郎，但当事实证明是其他人时，莎莉的未婚妻成为主要嫌疑人。—娜塔拉
